snippet: Jaime Rolando Rosenthal, Honduras’s vice president in the 1980s and one of its wealthiest men, is among those facing money laundering charges.
abstract: United States authorities charge former Honduras Vice Pres Jamie Rolando Rosenthal and his son Yani Rosenthal with laundering money for some of largest Central American drug cartels, adding to string of corruption cases in country.
lead_paragraph: Jaime Rolando Rosenthal, Honduras’s vice president in the 1980s and one of its wealthiest men, is among those facing money laundering charges.

headline.main: U.S. Indicts Members of Powerful Honduran Family
headline.print_headline: U.S. Indicts Members of Powerful Honduran Family
